<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Splitting should only occur for PHIs or between terminators,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because we only do local repairing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator()) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Why do we split?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a54f51880f9bdd786f0d0983c4f15122b">getOpIdx</a>()) == &amp;MO &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Repairing placement does not match operand&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we need splitting for phis, that means it is because we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could not find an insertion point before the terminators of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the predecessor block for this argument. In other words,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the input value is defined by one of the terminators.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>()) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Need split for phi def?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We split to repair the use of a phi or a terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> != &amp;(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstTerminator()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Need to split for the first terminator?!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the PHI case, the split may not be actually required.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the copy case, a phi is already a copy on the incoming edge,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// therefore there is no need to split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValMapping.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping/#a83b9746150eb1c8820d65bca34b8d950">NumBreakDowns</a> == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a already a copy, there is nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">        RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#adb2d45f98e7457256296b0943ddd4a6c">switchTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a756e97b1942ca89260909cfdfb64b957">RepairingPlacement::RepairingKind::Reassign</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point, we need to repair a defintion of a terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Technically we need to fix the def of MI on all outgoing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edges of MI to keep the repairing local. In other words, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will create several definitions of the same register. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// does not work for SSA unless that definition is a physical</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, there are other cases where we can get away with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that while still keeping the repairing local.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;This code is for the def of a terminator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we use RPO traversal, if we need to repair a definition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this means this definition could be:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 Used by PHIs (i.e., this VReg has been visited as part of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    uses of a phi.), or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 Part of a target specific instruction (i.e., the target applied</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    some register class constraints when creating the instruction.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the constraints come for #2, the target said that another mapping</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is supported so we may just drop them. Indeed, if we do not change</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the number of registers holding that value, the uses will get fixed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when we get to them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Uses in PHIs may have already been proceeded though.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the constraints come for #1, then, those are weak constraints and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// no actual uses may rely on them. However, the problem remains mainly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same as for #2. If the value stays in one register, we could</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// just switch the register bank of the definition, but we would need to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// account for a repairing cost for each phi we silently change.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In any case, if the value needs to be broken down into several</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers, the repairing is not local anymore as we need to patch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// every uses to rebuild the value in just one register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To summarize:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - If the value is in a physical register, we can do the split and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   fix locally.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise if the value is in a virtual register:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - If the value remains in one register, we do not have to split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   just switching the register bank would do, but we need to account</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   in the repairing cost all the phi we changed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - If the value spans several registers, then we cannot do a local</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   repairing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if this is a physical or virtual register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Reg.isPhysical()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are going to split every outgoing edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that this is possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: The machine representation is currently broken</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since it also several terminators in one basic block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because of that we would technically need a way to get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the targets of just one terminator to know which edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we have to split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assert that we do not hit the ill-formed representation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are other terminators before that one, some of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the outgoing edges may not be dominated by this definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> == &amp;(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstTerminator()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Do not know which outgoing edges are relevant&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNextNode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>-&gt;isUnconditionalBranch()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the next terminator uses Reg, this means we have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to split right after MI and thus we need a way to ask</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which outgoing edges are affected.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>-&gt;readsRegister(Reg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Need to split between terminators&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will split all the edges and repair there.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a virtual register defined by a terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValMapping.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping/#a83b9746150eb1c8820d65bca34b8d950">NumBreakDowns</a> == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is nothing to repair, but we may actually lie on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the repairing cost because of the PHIs already proceeded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as already stated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Though the code will be correct.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Repairing cost may not be accurate&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">      RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#adb2d45f98e7457256296b0943ddd4a6c">switchTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a98e66b30e93d741af07a3fefeb66ab1b">RepairingPlacement::RepairingKind::Impossible</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Account for the split cost and repair cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Unless the cost is already saturated or we do not care about the cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To get accurate information we need MBFI and MBPI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Thus, if we end up here this information should be here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a229ce6916aecf746e69143476a1e5686">MBFI</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#ab5b60d048f9e03018f15f3730cb24921">MBPI</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cost computation requires MBFI and MBPI&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: We will have to rework the repairing cost model.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The repairing cost depends on the register bank that MO has.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, when we break down the value into different values,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MO may not have a register bank while still needing repairing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the fast mode, we don&#39;t compute the cost so that is fine,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but still for the repairing code, we will have to make a choice.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the greedy mode, we should choose greedily what is the best</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// choice based on the next use of MO.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sums up the repairing cost of MO at each insertion point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t RepairCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#ac3cfa17f907e7258d898433ddfeb3fbf">getRepairCost</a>(MO, ValMapping);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is an impossible to repair cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RepairCost == std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">MappingCost::ImpossibleCost</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bias used for splitting: 5%.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t PercentageForBias = 5;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Bias = (RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias + 99) / 100;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We should not need more than a couple of instructions to repair</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an assignment. In other words, the computation should not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// overflow because the repairing cost is free of basic block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frequency.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((RepairCost &lt; RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">            (RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">             RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias + 99)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Repairing involves more than a billion of instructions?!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;InsertPoint&gt; &amp;InsertPt : RepairPt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InsertPt-&gt;canMaterialize() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;We should not have made it here&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will applied some basic block frequency and those uses uint64&#95;t.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InsertPt-&gt;isSplit())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">        Saturated = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.addLocalCost(RepairCost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t CostForInsertPt = RepairCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Again we shouldn&#39;t overflow here givent that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CostForInsertPt is frequency free at this point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CostForInsertPt + Bias &gt; CostForInsertPt &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Repairing + split bias overflows&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">        CostForInsertPt += Bias;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t PtCost = InsertPt-&gt;frequency(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#42; CostForInsertPt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we just overflowed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Saturated = PtCost &lt; CostForInsertPt))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.saturate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">          Saturated = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.addNonLocalCost(PtCost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop looking into what it takes to repair, this is already</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// too expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestCost &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &gt; &#42;BestCost) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Mapping is too expensive, stop processing\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No need to accumulate more cost information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to still gather the repairing information though.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Saturated)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Total cost is: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RepairingPlacement, 4&gt;</a> RepairPts;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we do not support splitting, we do not need to update</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// liveness and such, so do not do anything with P.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Splitting before phis requires more points&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!Before || !Instr.getNextNode() || !Instr.getNextNode()-&gt;isPHI()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#ad8275ad73d60d460541c51e9c11ddf7d">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::materialize</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isSplit()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Slice and return the beginning of the new block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we need to split between the terminators, we theoritically</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to know where the first and second set of terminators end</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to update the successors properly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now, in pratice, we should have a maximum of 2 branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions; one conditional and one unconditional. Therefore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we know how to update the successor by looking at the target of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the unconditional branch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we end up splitting at some point, then, we should update</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the liveness information and such. I.e., we would need to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// access P here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The machine verifier should actually make sure such cases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot happen.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not yet implemented&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise the insertion point is just the current or next</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction depending on Before. I.e., there is nothing to do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::isSplit</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the insertion point is after a terminator, we need to split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Before)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instr.isTerminator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we insert before an instruction that is after a terminator,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we are still after a terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">RegBankSelect::MappingCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::ImpossibleCost</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#aa0252d6f02b3a363b68e4438db3f82a7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#aa0252d6f02b3a363b68e4438db3f82a7">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::operator&lt;</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MappingCost &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sort out the easy cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If one is impossible to realize the other is cheaper unless it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// impossible as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()) || (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()) &lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If one is saturated the other is cheaper, unless it is saturated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isSaturated() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.isSaturated())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isSaturated() &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.isSaturated();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point we know both costs hold sensible values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both values have a different base frequency, there is no much</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we can do but to scale everything.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, if they have the same base frequency we can avoid making</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// complicated computation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ThisLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t OtherLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#ae5b35beb6f127e5f47269e9124b886fb">LLVM&#95;LIKELY</a>(LocalFreq == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point, we know the local costs are comparable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do the case that do not involve potential overflow first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NonLocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since the non-local costs do not discriminate on the result,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// just compare the local costs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The base costs are comparable so we may only keep the relative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value to increase our chances of avoiding overflows.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">    ThisLocalAdjust = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    OtherLocalAdjust = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">      OtherLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost - LocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">      ThisLocalAdjust = LocalCost - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal">    ThisLocalAdjust = LocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="normal">    OtherLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The non-local costs are comparable, just keep the relative value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ThisNonLocalAdjust = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t OtherNonLocalAdjust = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NonLocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">    OtherNonLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost - NonLocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">    ThisNonLocalAdjust = NonLocalCost - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale everything to make them comparable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ThisScaledCost = ThisLocalAdjust &#42; LocalFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for overflow on that operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisOverflows = ThisLocalAdjust &amp;&amp; (ThisScaledCost &lt; ThisLocalAdjust ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           ThisScaledCost &lt; LocalFreq);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t OtherScaledCost = OtherLocalAdjust &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for overflow on the last operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OtherOverflows =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal">      OtherLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal">      (OtherScaledCost &lt; OtherLocalAdjust || OtherScaledCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the non-local costs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">  ThisOverflows |= ThisNonLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">                   ThisScaledCost + ThisNonLocalAdjust &lt; ThisNonLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal">  ThisScaledCost += ThisNonLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal">  OtherOverflows |= OtherNonLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="normal">                    OtherScaledCost + OtherNonLocalAdjust &lt; OtherNonLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal">  OtherScaledCost += OtherNonLocalAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both overflows, we cannot compare without additional</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// precision, e.g., APInt. Just give up on that case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ThisOverflows &amp;&amp; OtherOverflows)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If one overflows but not the other, we can still compare.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ThisOverflows || OtherOverflows)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisOverflows &lt; OtherOverflows;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, just compare the values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisScaledCost &lt; OtherScaledCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a4ff1832629e69da1b5cf274d68a578c3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a4ff1832629e69da1b5cf274d68a578c3">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::operator==</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MappingCost &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost &amp;&amp; NonLocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">         LocalFreq == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
